verses.name: 2 Corinthians 8:20
verses.text: Avoiding this, that no man should blame us in this abundance which is administered by us:

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 8:21
verses.text: Providing for honest things, not only in the sight of the Lord, but also in the sight of men.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 8:22
verses.text: And we have sent with them our brother, whom we have oftentimes proved diligent in many things, but now much more diligent, upon the great confidence which I have in you.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 8:23
verses.text: Whether any do enquire of Titus, he is my partner and fellowhelper concerning you: or our brethren be enquired of, they are the messengers of the churches, and the glory of Christ.
